price: (Nuuhis) ni jedhe: "yaa ummata kiyya! Ani isiniif akeekkachiisaa ifa bahaadha.
arabic: قَالَ يَٰقَوۡمِ إِنِّي لَكُمۡ نَذِيرٞ مُّبِينٌ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: qāla yāqawmi innī lakum nadhīrun mubīnun
